fields.Description/Abstract: By Brady Moore, B. this is the research magazine of Boise State University Volume 8 no. 1 This issue is titled Ecology, Evolution and Behavior Dawn of a New Era at Boise State. The Inside Scoop Gut Fungi and River Bugs p 22 highlights work we have been doing on gut fungi and also fungicide influences to some extent. Print copy and online at Web Link: http://research.boisestate.edu/explore/files/2013/01/Inside-Scoop.pdf
